import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import 'bootstrap/js/dist/collapse' import 'bootstrap/js/dist/offcanvas' import 'bootstrap/js/dist/dropdown' import Cookies from "universal-cookie"; const cookies = new Cookies(); class MenuInicial extends Component { state = { usuadmin: false, stateLogin: false, } componentDidMount() { if (cookies.get("usu_nombres")) { this.setState({ stateLogin: true }) } else { this.setState({ stateLogin: false }) } console.log(this.state.stateLogin) if (cookies.get("per_id") === "63a1200b4e37aa088590933d") { this.setState({ usuadmin: true }) } else { this.setState({ usuadmin: false }) } } cerrarSesion() { cookies.remove("usu_id", { path: "/" }) cookies.remove("usu_email", { path: "/" }) cookies.remove("usu_nombres", { path: "/" }) cookies.remove("usu_apellidos", { path: "/" }) cookies.remove("per_id", { path: "/" }) //window.location.href="./" this.setState({ stateLogin: false }) this.setState({ usuadmin: false }) } render() { return (
